Interface MVPAdapter

public interface MVPAdapter

Method Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends ActionComponent> getComponentAction(java.lang.Class<?> componentKlass)
          For each Component supported, this method must return an instance of ActionComponenet to define the binding rules between a component and it's action in the associated presenter if the component class is not supported than throw an IllegalArgumentException
 java.lang.Class<? extends ModelComponent> getComponentModel(java.lang.Class<?> componentKlass)
          For each Component supported, this method must return an instance of ModelComponent to define the binding rules between a component and it's property name in the associated model.
 

Method Detail

getComponentAction

java.lang.Class<? extends ActionComponent> getComponentAction(java.lang.Class<?> componentKlass)
For each Component supported, this method must return an instance of ActionComponenet to define the binding rules between a component and it's action in the associated presenter if the component class is not supported than throw an IllegalArgumentException

Parameters:
componentKlass - the component class
Returns:
EventActionComponent instance

getComponentModel

java.lang.Class<? extends ModelComponent> getComponentModel(java.lang.Class<?> componentKlass)
For each Component supported, this method must return an instance of ModelComponent to define the binding rules between a component and it's property name in the associated model. if the component class is not supported than throw an IllegalArgumentException

Parameters:
componentKlass - the component class
Returns:
ModelComponent instance
